params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the project associated with the billing information that you want to update. For example, projects/tokyo-rain-123.

params.name: data.project_billing_info
params.description: The new billing information for the project. Read-only fields are ignored; thus, you can leave empty all fields except billing_account_name.
